\"Launch on system start\" only works in: "Qalisa ukuqala kwenkqubo" isebenza kuphela kwiindawo zedesktop ezihambelana ne-XDG. Ukunika uphawu lwe-Mailspring kwi-tray yesistimu, unokufuna ukufaka i-libappindicator.

Changes are saved automatically. View th: Utshintsho lugcinwa ngokuzenzekelayo. Jonga i %@ ngeengcebiso kunye neengcebiso.
Click 'Learn More' to view instructions: Cofa 'Funda ngakumbi' ukujonga imiyalelo kwisikolo sethu solwazi.

Connection Error - Unable to connect to: Iphutha loxhumo - Ayikwazi ukuxhuma kumncedisi / kwisixokelelwano osinikezile.
Could not reach Mailspring. Please try a: Ayikwazanga ukufikelela kwi-Mailspring. Nceda uzame kwakhona okanye qha ga mshelana support@getmailspring.com ukuba umcimbi uyaqhubeka. (%@: %@)

Create templated messages and fill them: Yenza imilayezo ethempelisiweyo uze uwagcwalise ngokukhawuleza ukuphendula kwimilayezo kwaye wenze i-automated workflows yakho.

Default Window Controls and Auto-hiding: I-Window Controls kunye neMenubar yokuzifihla ngokuzenzekelayo
Delete your custom key bindings and rese: Cima izibophelelo zakho zesihluthulelo kunye nokusetha kwakhona kwiifayile ezingaguqukiyo?

Do you prefer a single panel layout (lik: Ngaba ukhetha ukuhlelwa kwepaneli enye (njengeGmail) okanye i-panel panel?
Enable read receipts %@ or link tracking: Nika amandla iirisithi zokufunda %@ okanye ukulandelela ikhonkco %@ ukubona izaziso apha.
Enable verbose IMAP / SMTP logging: Nika amandla i verbose IMAP / SMTP logging
Enter your email account credentials to: Faka iinkcukacha ze-akhawunti yakho ye-imeyile ukuze uqalise.
Faka iinkcukacha ze-akhawunti yakho ye-imeyile ukuze uqalise. I-Mailspringhanna︎stores iphasiwedi yakho ye-imeyli ngokukhuselekileyo kwaye ayithunyelwa nakumavava ethu.
GMX requires that you %@ before using em: I-GMX idinga ukuba %@ ngaphambi kokusebenzisa abaxhasi be-imeyili njenge-Mailspring.
Get notified when each recipient opens y: Yaziswa xa ummkeli ngamnye evula i-imeyile yakho ukuthumela ukulandelelana ngexesha kunye nezikhumbuzi.
Get reminded if you don't receive a repl: Khunjuzwa ukuba awufumani impendulo yalo myalezo ngexesha elithile.
Give your draft a subject to name your t: Nika iqulunqa lakho kwisifundo ukubiza igama lakho lethemplate.
Gmail IMAP is not enabled. Visit Gmail s: I-IMAP ye-Gmail ayivunywanga. Ukutyelela izicwangciso ze-Gmail ukuyivula.
Gmail bandwidth exceeded. Please try aga: I-bandwidth ye-Gmail idlulile. Nceda uzame kwakhona mva.
Have a GitHub account? Want to contibute: Unayo i-akhawunti yeGitHub? Ngaba ufuna ukuguqulela ezininzi iinguqulelo? Nika ngokuthe ngqo nge-Request Demon!
If you enjoy Mailspring, upgrade to Mail: Ukuba ujabulela i-Mailspring, phucula kwi-Mailspring Pro ukusuka ku- %@ ukwenzela ukuba zonke ezi zinto zibonelele ngokusisigxina:
If you write a draft in another language: Ukuba ubhala iqulunqo ngolwimi olunye, i-Mailspring izakuyijonga ngokuzenzekelayo kwaye isebenzise isichazi-magama esilungileyo emva kwezivakalisi ezimbalwa.
If you've enabled link tracking or read: Ukuba unikwe amandla okulandelela ikhonkco okanye ukufunda iirisithi, ezo ziganeko ziya kubonakala apha!
In order to perform actions on this mail: Ukuze wenze izenzo kule bhokisi yeposi, kufuneka ulungise inkinga yokuvumelanisa. Ukutyelela Okuthandayo> IiAkhawunti zeenkcukacha ezingaphezulu.
In order to send mail through Mailspring: Ukuze uthumele iposi ngokusebenzisa i-Mailspring, i-akhawunti yakho ye-imeyli kufuneka ibe nefowuni yeposi. Ungacacisa ifolda eThunyelwe ngesandla ngokutyelela Izinto ezikhethiweyo> Iifolda kunye nokukhetha igama lefolda kwimenyu ehlayo.

Ukuze uthumele i-imeyile ngokusebenzisa i-Mailspring, i-akhawunti yakho ye-imeyile kufuneka ibe nefolda yeTrash. Ungacacisa ifolda yeTrash ngesandla ngokutyelela Izinto ezikhethiweyo> Iifolda kunye nokukhetha igama lefolda kwimenyu ehlayo.
Invalid template name! Names can only co: Igama lethemplate elingavumelekanga! Amagama anokugcina kuphela iileta, iinombolo, izithuba, udibanisa, kunye nokugxininisa.
It looks like your draft already has som: Kubukeka ngathi uyilo loyilo luvele luqulethe umxholo. Ukulayisha le template kuza kubhala konke okubhaliweyo.
It originates from %@ but replies will g: Ivela ku- %@ kodwa iimpendulo ziya ku %@.
Link tracking does not work offline. Ple: Ukulandelwa kwesixhumanisi akusebenzi ku-intanethi. Nceda unike amandla kwakhona xa ubuya kwi-intanethi.
Mailspring can no longer authenticate wi: I-Mailspring ayikwazi ukugunyaza kunye %@. Iphasiwedi okanye ukuqinisekiswa kusenokutshintsha.
Mailspring can't find your Drafts folder: I-Mailspring ayikwazi ukufumana ifolda yakho yoBuhlu. Ukudala nokuthumela i-imeyile, tyelela Iintandokazi> Iifolda uze ukhethe ifolda yeBrafti.
Mailspring could not find the mailsync p: I-Mailspring ingayifumana inkqubo ye-mailsync. Ukuba uyakha i-Mailspring evela kumthombo, qiniseka ukuba i-mailsync.tar.gz ikhutshiwe kwaye ikhutshwe kwikhophi yakho yokusebenza.
Mailspring could not save an attachment: I-Mailspring ayikwazanga ukulondoloza isinamathiselo ngenxa yokuba uphumelele kwi disk space.
I-Mailspring ayikwazanga ukulondoloza isinamathiselo. Khangela ukuba iimvume zibekwe ngokuchanekileyo kwaye uzame ukuqala kwakhona i-Mailspring ukuba umcimbi uyaqhubeka.
Mailspring could not store your password: I-Mailspring ayikwazanga ukugcina iphasiwedi yakho ngokukhuselekileyo. %@ Ukuze uthole ulwazi oluninzi, tyelela %@
Mailspring desktop notifications on Linu: Iifayile zeMailspring izaziso zeDesktop zifuna iZenity. Unokufuna ukuyifaka kunye nomphathi wakho wephakheji.
Mailspring does not support stylesheets: I-Mailspring ayixhasi iifayile zeetayiti kunye nokongezwa: %@
Mailspring encountered errors syncing th: I-Mailspring iifayile ezidibeneyo zivumelanisa le akhawunti. Iingxelo ze-Crash zithunyelwe kwiqela le-Mailspring kwaye siya kusebenza ukulungisa ezi mpazamo ekukhululweni okulandelayo.
Mailspring is clearing it's cache for %@: I-Mailspring iyicima i-cache %@. Ngokuxhomekeke kubukhulu bebhokisi leposi, oku kungathatha imizuzwana embalwa okanye imizuzu embalwa. Isaziso siya kuvela xa ukucoca kuqediwe.
Mailspring is independent %@ software, a: I-Mailspring iyisistim esizimeleyo %@, kwaye imali yokubhalisa ivumela ukuba sichithe ixesha lokugcina nokuphucula imveliso.
Mailspring is running in dev mode and ma: I-Mailspring isebenza kwimodi yeD dev kwaye inokuphuculwa!
Mailspring is syncing this thread and it: I-Mailspring ivumelanisa le misonto kwaye izinamathiselo kwifu. Ngemiqolo emide, oku kungathatha isikhashana.
Mailspring reset the local cache for %@: I-Mailspring yenza kwakhona i-cache yendawo yangaphakathi %@ kwi %@ imizuzwana. Ibhokisi lakho leposi liya kuqala ukuvumelanisa kwakhona.
Mailspring shows you everything about yo: I-Mailspring ibonisa yonke into malunga nabafowunelwa bakho ngaphakathi kwebhokisi lakho lebhokisi. Bona iinkcukacha ze-LinkedIn, i-Twitter bios, imbali yomyalezo, kunye nokunye.
Mailspring was unable to modify your key: I-Mailspring ayikwazanga ukuguqula i-keymaps yakho kwi %@.
Mailspring was unable to read the conten: I-Mailspring ayikwazanga ukufunda iziqulatho zezikhompyutheni zakho (%@). Unokufuna ukususa le fowulda okanye uqinisekise ukuba iimvume zefayile zenziwe ngokuchanekileyo.
Mailspring was unable to reset the local: I-Mailspring ayikwazanga ukusetha kwakhona i-cache yendawo. %@
Mailspring was unable to write to the fi: I-Mailspring ayikwazanga ukubhala kwindawo yefayili ochaziweyo (%@).

Scaling adjusts the entire UI, including: Ukutshintsha kulungelelanisa i-UI yonke, kubandakanywa imifanekiso, abahluleli kunye neetekisi. Imilayezo oyithumelayo iya kuba neesayizi zohlobo lwefonti. Ukwenyuka kwesikali esininzi kunokwenza abahluli kunye neempawu ezincinci ukucofa.
Schedule messages to re-appear later to: Imiyalezo yeshedyuli ukuvela kwakhona emva koko ukugcina ibhokisi lakho lokungenayo licocekile kwaye ugxininise kwi-todos esheshayo.
Schedule messages to send at the ideal t: Imiyalezo yeShedyuli ukuthumela ngexesha elifanelekileyo lokunyusa izinga lakho lokuphendula nge-imeyile okanye u-automate udibanise ii-imeyile.
Schedule this message to send at the ide: Hlela lo myalezo ukuthumela ngexesha elifanelekileyo. I-Mailspring yenza kube lula ukulawula i-timetime space!
See detailed information about companies: Bona ulwazi oluchanekileyo malunga neenkampani zakho ze-imeyile, kuquka ubukhulu babo, inkxaso kunye nexesha.

Send more than one message using the sam: Thumela umyalezo ongaphezulu kweyodwa usebenzisa enye %@ okanye umgca wesihloko ukuthelekisa amazinga avulekileyo kunye namazinga okuphendula.
Sent from Mailspring, the best free emai: Kuthunyelwe kwi-Mailspring, i-app engcono kakhulu ye-imeyile yohlelo lokusebenza
Show icon in menu bar / system tray: Bonisa uphawu kwimenyu yebar / inkqubo yenkqubo
Show unread counts for all folders / lab: Bonisa ukubala okungafundwayo kuwo onke amafolda / amalebula

Snooze this email and it'll return to yo: Snooze le imeyile kwaye iya kubuya kwibhokisi yakho yangenayo kamva. Cofa apha okanye swayipha ngaphaya komgca kwibhokisi lakho lokungenayo ukuze unyuse.

Thank you for using %@ and supporting in: Ndiyabonga ngokusebenzisa %@ nokuxhasa isofthiwe esizimeleyo. Fumana okubhaliweyo kubhaliso lwakho: hlola iimpawu zephantsi apha okanye tyelela i- %@ ukuze ufunde okungaphezulu ngezikhumbuzo, iitemplates, ulwazi lokusebenza, nokunye.
Thanks for downloading Mailspring! Would: Ndiyabulela ukulanda i-Mailspring! Ungathanda ukuyihambisa kwifolda yakho yezicelo?

This account is invalid or Mailspring co: Le akhawunti ayivumelekanga okanye i-Mailspring ayikwazanga ukuyifumana i-Inbox okanye yonke ifowulda ifolda. %@
This looks like a Gmail account! While i: Oku kubonakala ngathi i-akhawunti ye-Gmail! Nangona kunokwenzeka ukusetha iphasiwedi ye-App kwaye udibanise ne-Gmail nge-IMAP, i-Mailspring ixhasa i-Google OAuth. Buyela emva kwaye ukhethe "I-Gmail ne-Google Apps" evela kumboneleli weskrini.
This plugin or theme %@ does not list \": Le iplagi okanye umxholo %@ ayibhalisi "i-mailspring" kwimihlaba ye "pack" yepakini. Cela umthuthukisi ukuba avivinye i-plugin nge-Mailspring kwaye uyongeze, okanye ulandele imiyalelo apha: %@

To listen for the Gmail Oauth response,:
Ukuphulaphula impendulo ye-Gmail Oauth, i-Mailspring idinga ukuqala i-webserver kwi-port $ {LOCAL_SERVER_PORT}. Nceda ubuyele kwaye uzama ukudibanisa iakhawunti yakho kwakhona. Ukuba le mpazamo iyaqhubeka, sebenzisa inketho ye-IMAP / SMTP nge-Password App yephasiwedi.

When enabled, Mailspring will notify you: Xa kunikwe amandla, i-Mailspring iza kukuxelela ngokukhawuleza xa umntu efunda lo myalezo. Ukuthumela kwiqela? I-Mailspring ibonisa ukuba ngabaphi abafumanayo bavula i-imeyile yakho ukuze ulandele ngokuchanekileyo.
When link tracking is turned on, Mailspr: Xa ulandelelwano lwekhonkco luvuliwe, i-Mailspring iya kukuxelela xa abamukeli bechofoza ikhonkco kule imeyile.
When reading messages, mark as read: Xa ufunda imilayezo, phawula njengoko ufundwayo
With activity tracking, you’ll know as s: Ngomkhondo wokulandelela, uyazi ngokukhawuleza xa umntu efunda umyalezo wakho. Ukuthumela kwiqela? I-Mailspring ibonisa ukuba ngabaphi abafumanayo bavula i-imeyile yakho ukuze ulandele ngokuchanekileyo.
Would you like to make Mailspring your d: Ungathanda ukwenza i-Mailspring iklayenti yakho ye-imeyli engapheliyo?
Write better emails with LinkedIn profil: Bhala ii-imeyile ezingcono kunye neeprofayili ze-LinkedIn, i-Twitter bios, imbali yomyalezo, kunye nangaphezulu kwibharari elifanelekileyo.
You are using %@, which is free! You can: Usebenzisa %@, ekhululekile! Unokuzama izinto ezinje ngokusnuza, thumela kamva, funda iirisithi kunye nezikhumbuzo amaxesha ambalwa ngeveki.
You can add reminders to %1$@ emails eac: Unokongeza izikhumbuzi kwi %1$@ i-imeyile nganye %2$@ nge-Mailspring Basic.
You can choose a shortcut set to use key: Unokukhetha ikhefu elifutshane lokusebenzisa amancinci ekhibhodi yeenkampani eziqhelekileyo ze-imeyile. Ukuhlela indlela emfutshane, nqakraza kulo uluhlu olungezantsi kwaye faka indawo endaweni yebhodibhodi.
You can get open and click notifications: Ungakwazi ukuvula kwaye uqakraza izaziso ze %1$@ ii-imeyili nganye %2$@ nge-Mailspring Basic.
You can schedule sending of %1$@ emails: Unokucwangcisa ukuthumela i- %1$@ i-imeyile nganye %2$@ nge-Mailspring Basic.
You can view contact profiles for %1$@ e: Unokujonga iinkcukacha zoqhagamshelwano ze %1$@ ii-imeyili nganye %2$@ kunye ne-Mailspring Basic.
You haven't created any mail rules. To g: Awuyidala imigaqo yeposi. Ukuze uqalise, cacisa umgaqo omtsha ngasentla uze utshele i-Mailspring indlela yokucwangcisa ibhokisi lakho lebhokisi.
You may need to %@ to your Yandex accoun: Unokufuna %@ kwi-akhawunti yakho ye-Yandex ngaphambi kokuxhuma i-imeyile zokusebenza. Ukuba usebenzisa i-auth-factor factor, kufuneka udale i- %@ ye-Mailspring.
You may need to configure aliases with y: Unokufuna ukulungelelanisa izivumelwano kunye nomnikezeli wakho weposi (Outlook, Gmail) ngaphambi kokuzisebenzisa.
You need to provide one or more recipien: Kufuneka unikeze omnye okanye abamukeli abaninzi ngaphambi kokuba uthumele umyalezo.
You'll find Mailspring, along with other: Uza kufumana i-Mailspring, kunye nezinye iindlela, ezidweliswe kwiiNkqubo eziPhezulu> Imeyili.
You're on a pre-release channel. We'd lo: Usukho kwisiteshi sokukhishwa kwangaphambili. Siyakuthanda impendulo yakho.
Your Mailspring ID is missing required f: I-ID yakho ye-Mailspring ilahlekile kwiindawo ezifunekayo - unokufuna ukusetha kwakhona i-Mailspring. %@
Your `Sent Mail` folder could not be aut: Ifayili yakho 'yeThumela yeposi' ayikwazanga ukufunyanwa ngokuzenzekelayo. Ukutyelela Okukhethiweyo> Iifolda zokukhetha ifolda ethunyelweyo kwaye uzame kwakhona.
Your `Trash` folder could not be automat: Ifolda yakho `Udoti 'ayikwazanga ukufunyanwa ngokuzenzekelayo. Ukutyelela Okuthandayo> Iifolda zokukhetha ifolda yeTrash uze uzame kwakhona.
Your updated localization will be review: Indawo yakho ehlaziyiweyo iya kuhlaziywa kwaye ifakwe kwinguqu ezayo ye-Mailspring.
iCloud requires that you create a unique: ICloud idinga ukuba udale iphasiwedi ye-app ekhethekileyo yee-imeyile zokusebenza ezifana ne-Mailspring. Landela %@ ukudala enye uze uyidibanise ngezantsi.
Instantly translate messages you receive: Kwangoko tolika imiyalezo oyifumana kulwimi olukhethileyo lokufunda.
Mailspring will no longer offer to trans: Imaphulelo asizukunikeza ukuguqulela imiyalezo ebhaliweyo kwi %@.
Privacy note: text below will be sent to: Inqaku labucala: isicatshulwa esingezantsi siyakuthunyelwa kwinkonzo yokuguqulela kwi-intanethi.
Unfortunately, translation services bill: Ngelishwa, iinkonzo zokuguqulela zibhida ngohlobo ngalunye kwaye asinakho ukubonelela ngesi simahla.
You can translate up to %1$@ emails each: Ungaguqulela kwii- %1$@ ii-imeyile nganye %2$@ ngeMailspring Basic.
